explains: adj. 不会出毛病的，万无一失的

sentences.en: The treatment will be tried out on human beings only after it has been shown to be safe and foolproof in animals.
sentences.cn: 该疗法只有在动物身上证明安全、万无一失后才会在人体上试用。

sentences.en: The system is not 100 per cent foolproof.
sentences.cn: 该系统不是百分之百不出毛病的。

sentences.en: This recipe is foolproof—it works every time.
sentences.cn: 这个食谱绝对管用，每次都万无一失。
